data.enText: to receive money, property, etc. from sb when they die

data.chText: 她从她父亲那里继承了一大笔财富。
data.enText: She inherited a fortune from her father.

data.chText: 经遗传获得（品质、身体特征等）
data.enText: to have qualities, physical features, etc. that are similar to those of your parents, grandparents, etc.

data.chText: 这种耐心是母亲遗传给他的。
data.enText: He has inherited his mother's patience.
if you inherit a particular situation from sb, you are now responsible for dealing with it, especially because you have replaced that person in their job
policies inherited from the previous administration

means: 经遗传获得(品质、身体特征等)

tr: obtain from someone after their death
example: I inherited a castle from my French grandparents
I inherited my good eyesight from my mother
The new chairman inherited many problems from the previous chair

value.def: If you inherit money or property, you receive it from someone who has died.

example.ex: He has no son to inherit his land.
example.tran: 他没有儿子来继承田产。

example.ex: ...paintings that he inherited from his father.
example.tran: 他从父亲那里继承来的油画

value.def: If you inherit something such as a task, problem, or attitude, you get it from the people who used to have it, for example because you have taken over their job or been influenced by them.

example.ex: The government inherited an impossible situation from its predecessors...
example.tran: 这届政府从前任那里接过了一个非常棘手的烂摊子。

example.ex: Our legal system inherited laws from the English system.
example.tran: 我们的司法体系沿袭了英国的法律体系。

example.ex: ...the inherited wisdoms contained in its social hierarchy.
example.tran: 社会等级划分中所包含的传承下来的智慧

value.def: If you inherit a characteristic or quality, you are born with it, because your parents or ancestors also had it.

example.ex: We inherit from our parents many of our physical characteristics...
example.tran: 我们的许多身体特征都是从父母那里遗传而来的。

example.ex: Her children have inherited her love of sport...
example.tran: 她的孩子们继承了她对运动的热爱。

example.ex: Stammering is probably an inherited defect.
example.tran: 口吃很可能是一种遗传性缺陷。

value.tran: 经遗传获得(特征、特质等)
